attributes.action: Ban the burning of Heather and Moorlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The legal burning of heather and moorland is so outdated.  This so called 'land management' is not applicable any longer due to global warming.  The people who do this say it's to help birds nesting - yes - so they can come along at a future date and shoot them!!  It is time this was outlawed we have to start somewhere or in a few years time there will be no world left to manage!  If you live near heather/moorland you get choked by these appalling people.
